subject: AI & Agents
title: Defining Success Metrics for AI Features
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Defining Success Metrics for AI Features.

hook.text: Your model is 95% accurate. Revenue dropped. What went wrong?

buildup.text: Model metrics (accuracy, F1) don't always correlate with product metrics (engagement, revenue).

discovery.text: Define success at three levels: model quality, feature engagement, and business impact.

twist.text: A 'worse' model that gives faster results may increase engagement more than a slower perfect one.

punchline.text: Model accuracy is a means, not the end.
